description: This file serves as the entry point for the HTTP server, initializing and starting the Express application, setting up graceful shutdown handling on SIGTERM signals, and exporting the server instance.

methods.name: app.listen
methods.description: Starts the Express server on specified host and port.

methods.name: process.on
methods.description: Sets up an event listener for process signals like SIGTERM for graceful shutdown.

methods.name: server.close
methods.description: Closes the HTTP server connection gracefully.

methods.name: console.log
methods.description: Outputs messages to the console for logging.

methods.name: process.exit
methods.description: Exits the Node.js process after shutdown.
